```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)

x <- read.csv("./content/datasets/PSEResultsOfficial_Honolulu2018.csv", colClasses = "character")

x <- tbl_df(x)
glimpse(x)

x <- x %>%
  rename(d5k = T1...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d10k = T2...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d15k = T3...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d21k = T4...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d25k = T5...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d30k = T6...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d35k = T7...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d40k = T8...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.,
         d42k = T9...ChipTime..HH.mm.ss.) %>%
  select(-starts_with('T'), -UnderlyingURL) 

glimpse(x)
mutate(x,BibNum=sapply(strsplit(x$BibNum, split='\\t', fixed=TRUE),function(x) (x[1])))


```
